title: Requests
currentQueryTerminateToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while stopping the request
currentQueryTerminateToastSuccesTitle: The request has been successfully completed
currentQueryTerminateToastSuccesFalseTit: The request could not be completed successfully
queryStatisticsDescription: Query statistics gather the statistics collected in performance schemas. They enable you to monitor server events (e.g. syncing, temporary tables, indexes, joins, etc.)
queryStatistcsResetToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while resetting the statistics
queryStatistcsResetToastSuccesTitle: The query statistics have been reset.
